wikipedia_page.main: Dillon Young Pennington (born 26 February 1999) is an English cricketer. He made his List A debut for Worcestershire in the 2018 Royal London One-Day Cup on 7 June 2018. Prior to his List A debut, he was named in England's squad for the 2018 Under-19 Cricket World Cup.He made his first-class debut for Worcestershire in the 2018 County Championship on 25 June 2018. He made his Twenty20 debut for Worcestershire in the 2018 t20 Blast on 8 July 2018. In May 2021, in the 2021 County Championship match against Derbyshire, Pennington took his maiden five-wicket haul in first-class cricket.
